author: louzao_
content: Hi. I don’t know if this is the proper channel.. I’m adapting a service that send txns, and I’m testing this algorithm locally (the one suggested in hackmd.io) https://github.com/zsfelfoldi/ethereum-docs/blob/master/eip1559/feeHistory_example.js I feel confused about the baseFee field, that it’s too low in Ropsten. Is this field being represented in gWei o in Wei scale? Thanks!

author: perama
content: It is in wei, the reason being that because the demand for testnet blockspace is low, the basefee keeps falling.
